blocks.name: Charge
blocks.text: If [name] moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a target and then hits it with a horn attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra DMG[2d8] piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

blocks.name: Innate Spellcasting
blocks.text:
[name]'s innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC SDC[CHA]). [name] can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

At will: *detect evil and good*, *druidcraft*, *pass without trace*
1/day each: *calm emotions*, *dispel evil and good*, *entangle*

blocks.name: Magic Resistance
blocks.text: [name] has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

blocks.name: Multiattack
blocks.text: [name] makes two attacks: one with its hooves and one with its horn.

blocks.name: Hooves
blocks.text: *Melee Weapon Attack:* ATK[STR] to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. *Hit:* DMG[2d6 + STR] bludgeoning damage.

blocks.name: Horn
blocks.text: *Melee Weapon Attack:* ATK[STR] to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. *Hit:* DMG[1d8 + STR] piercing damage.

blocks.name: Healing Touch (3/Day)
blocks.text: [name] touches another creature with its horn. The target magically regains DMG[2d8 + 2] hit points. In addition, the touch removes all diseases and neutralizes all poisons afflicting the target.

blocks.name: Teleport (1/Day)
blocks.text: [name] magically teleports itself and up to three willing creatures it can see within 5 ft. of it, along with any equipment they are wearing or carrying, to a location [name] is familiar with, up to 1 mile away.

blocks.name: Hooves
blocks.text: [name] makes one attack with its hooves.

blocks.name: Shimmering Shield (Costs 2 Actions)
blocks.text: [name] creates a shimmering, magical field around itself or another creature it can see within 60 ft. of it. The target gains a +2 bonus to AC until the end of [name]'s next turn.

legendaryActions.description: [name] can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. [name] regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.
